item.description:
Last call for tickets. Please update your RSVPs.

Boston Uncorked is a sponsor of the Red Sox Natives!  

Boston Uncorked is turning SEVEN this year and is throwing a party to celebrate. Read on if you are ready for another great wine tasting event from Boston Uncorked and purchase your tickets now. The last event sold out again so this one should fill up fast.

 The event will take place on Wednesday, April 9 from 7:00 - 9:00 PM at Forum (formerly Vox) on Boylston Street in the Back Bay. As always, the food and wine will be flowing freely and will include some old and new favorites. We will be joined by Tonya's Boston Happy Hour and Jim's Boston Wine groups along with a few others.  

Tickets are $39.00 per person. There are no Maybe RSVPs since you must purchase a ticket in advance from Boston Uncorked.

To purchase your ticket go www.bostonuncorked.org http://www.bostonuncorked.org. 

 Do not call or contact Forum.

If you have never attended one of Boston Uncorked events, please check out their web site with photographs and history of past events.

We suggest you arrive early at 6:45 P.M. to meet and take advantage of the entire evening and take public transit if possible.

See you there.

Frank and The Red Sox Natives
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at 6:45 P.M. at the Bar on the first floor & Inside after 7:00 P.M.
item.name: Boston Uncorked 7th Anniversary Wine Tasting Party at Forum in Back Bay
